      Traverse the plan by following any connected operators.

      Traverses a plan.

      Traverses a plan in a focused manner.
      PlanTraversal PlanTraversal.traversingFlat()
      If this method is invoked, this instance will not enter CompositeOperators and instead treat them just the same as ElementaryOperators.
      PlanTraversal PlanTraversal.traversingHierarchically()
      If this method is invoked, this instance will not treat Subplans and OperatorAlternatives as normal traversed Operators but will rather enter them and traverse their contained Operators.
      static PlanTraversal PlanTraversal.upstream()
